quest_shipment_text.speaker: Alicia
quest_shipment_text.content: Oh! Are you looking for the supply cart? I heard it! I was listening to the wind near the chasm, and I heard squeaky wheels stop suddenly. Then... goblin noises. Lots of them.

options.label: Goblins? I should tell the guard.

quest_shipment_resolve.speaker: Alicia
quest_shipment_resolve.content: Please be careful! If the goblins have the food, they'll be... energetic.

intro_text.speaker: Alicia
intro_text.content: Oh! H-hello—! I… I didn’t see you coming. I’m Alicia. Welcome to my shop! Uhm— please look around! And— and if you’re hungry, I can warm something up. Not for sale. Just… because.

intro_kind_text.speaker: Alicia
intro_kind_text.content: M-me? No, I’m… I’m normal. I just… I don’t like when people look empty. Like they forgot they have a body. Sorry. That sounded weird.

intro_not_weird_text.speaker: Alicia
intro_not_weird_text.content: …Thank you. People usually laugh. Or they say ‘that’s cute’ and then they don’t mean it. Anyway! Please— uhm— browse!

default_hub_text.speaker: Alicia
default_hub_text.content: Oh! H-hello there! It's good to see you again. Please, look around. And— uh— drink water. People forget.

talk_hub.speaker: Alicia
talk_hub.content: (She fiddles with a loose thread on her apron, waiting for you to speak.)

talk_laura.speaker: Alicia
talk_laura.content: Laura? She’s… she’s amazing. She’s strong, and beautiful, and… and she smells like vanilla and iron. Is that weird? That’s weird. Forget I said that.

talk_shop.speaker: Alicia
talk_shop.content: I sell things that keep you alive! It makes me happy. Watching people leave with full bags… it means they might come back. That’s nice.

talk_self.speaker: Alicia
talk_self.content: Me? I’m just Alicia. I like baking. And… I like listening to the rain. The dungeon is scary, but the rain makes it sound like it’s sleeping.

quest_offer_text.speaker: Alicia
quest_offer_text.content: Actually… can I ask a favor? It’s about Laura. I want to give her something special. Something that… shines like she does. There’s a crystal, a ‘Glittering Teardrop’, deep in the dungeon. Would you…?

quest_active_text.speaker: Alicia
quest_active_text.content: The Glittering Teardrop… please be careful. It’s pretty, but the dungeon is mean. Don’t get hurt for a rock, okay?

quest_turnin_text.speaker: Alicia
quest_turnin_text.content: You… you found it! Oh, look at it! It’s perfect. It catches the light just like her eyes when she’s happy. Thank you! Thank you so much!

quest_completed_text.speaker: Alicia
quest_completed_text.content: I’m going to make this into a necklace. Or maybe a ring? No, a necklace. She doesn’t like rings when she works. Thank you again!
